name: Meta-Glitch
description:
Interactive piece created with code in Hydra (hydra.ojack.xyz).Move the mouse to distort the image.

Hydra is a toolkit for live coding of network visuals created by Olivia Jack (ojack.xyz)

You can see the code of this visual and interact with it in the following link: https://hydra.ojack.xyz/?

/*Meta-Glitch
by Daniel Oropeza
Tw: @ferdoropeza
*/

noise(80,0.5)
.rotate(0,()=>mouse.x/10000)
.pixelate(100,1000)
.scale(2.05)
.color(1,0.7,-1)
.saturate(1.5)
.rotate(()=>time*0.1).mask(voronoi(80,0.1,9).luma().invert().luma())
.colorama(0.06).saturate(2.1).contrast(2)
.modulateScale(o0,100).luma(0.01)
.blend(o0)
.blend(o0)
.modulate(osc(2),-0.004)
.modulatePixelate(o0,2000,4)
  .scrollX([0.001, 0])
  .scrollY([0, -0.001])
.scale(1.01)
.out(o0)
